image:image.image:title: B.B. King — O Rei do Blues

image:image.image:caption: Cantora de soul contemporânea com turbante e estilo vintage elegante
image:image.image:title: Andra Day — A Nova Voz do Soul

image:image.image:title: Nat King Cole — O Cavaleiro do Piano e da Voz
